title: (x) Derrick - Kada {Dav}
content: Im looking for this font, i've tried Whatthefont.com but no with no help there.. ![Screenshot](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203743im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70607.jpg)
author: rocknform

comments.content:
I have found whatthefont to be pretty useless.   
   
Are you sure this is a font? If it's a logo, someone might have added the stenciling themselves. You could get a pretty close approximation with [Frankfurter](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frankfurter/frankfurter/testdrive.html?s=DERRICK&p=72).

This reminds me of an old Mecanorma dry-transfer face - but the completely name escapes me at the moment and I can't seen to locate my old MN catalog. Dang.   
   
Mark! Mark Simonson! This one's for you...

\> Mark! Mark Simonson! This one's for you...   
   
You would think, but all I could think of was Beans, the old Letragraphica font, and I knew that wasn't it.

_Dav you're killing me! You're too much, really._   
   
It is getting out of hand. I count at least eight Dav IDs in the last week alone. Yeesh. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203743im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Thanks.. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203743im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)   
   
( Well, What else could I say.. I am really thankful for Typophile.. '_( More or less )_ Anonymous Typoholics United'.. And, It seems I became seriously addicted to this particular 'Type Identification Board'.. )
